Name: Hack or Die!
About the game: Save your best friend Kevin from the evil Block Head! Unique enemy mechanics and huge bosses stand in your way. Keep the ball air-born while you kick your way through sprawling levels. Expanding hacky-sacks primary concept: keep the ball up with your arsenal of crazy kicks... or DIE! THE HACKY-SACK PLATFORMER UNIQUE KICKING MECHANICS KICK JUMP RUN = Simple controls with huge depth. Intuitive button combinations lead to amazing stunts and tricks. Flip, Slide, Charge-up and explore the insane depth of controls. ANYONE CAN HACK IT DONT WORRY. Beginners can learn to kick at their own pace with instant re-spawns and lots of checkpoints. Accessibility options allows players to play their way. Anyone can kick and KICKING STUFF IS FUN! DESIGNED FOR SPEED-RUNNERS SKILLS. Veteran players can showcase their skills with amazing acrobatics and blazing fast kicks. Use your speed-multiplying bicycle flip-kick to build momentum and long jump to fly across stages.
